fusilli.utils.csv_loss_plotterïƒ

Plotting the loss from a CSV file generated by the training process when params[â€œlogâ€] is set to False. (If set to True, then a weights and biases logger is used.)

Functions

plot_loss_curve(params,Â logger[,Â show])

Plots the loss curve from a CSV file generated by the training process.
plot_loss_curve(params, logger, show=False)[source]ïƒ

Plots the loss curve from a CSV file generated by the training process. The figure is saved to params[â€œloss_fig_pathâ€] if show is False, otherwise it is shown with plt.show().

Parameters:

  • params (dict) â€“ Dictionary containing the parameters for the model.

  • logger (pytorch lightning logger) â€“ Logger that was used to log the training process. CSVLogger.

  • show (bool) â€“ If True, show the plot. If False, save the plot to a file. Default: False.

Return type:

None
